numlitem.para: Both automatic pressure control systems are operative, and
CABIN ALT or CABIN RATE of climb indicator is operative.

Ear discomfort or unscheduled change in cabin altitude are indications of both automatic pressure control systems failure. In the event of dual failure, select MANUAL on Cabin Altitude Control Mode Select Panel. Manually control cabin altitude rate of change.

placard.para: Placard light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
